jcr:content.jcr:description: Definisse™ Hydrobooster replenishes the levels of hyaluronic acid in the dermis, preventing and reducing these unwanted changes, resulting in radiant and glowing skin.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Definisse™ Hydroboosters

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title:
Nourish and hydrate your skin with a boost
of the ultimate moisturiser – HA (hyaluronic acid)

text.text:
As we age our skin suffers from a reduction in hyaluronic acid, the principle molecule responsible for maintaining water in the skin. The impact of this is a notable dulling of our skin, a loss of elasticity and the appearance of fine lines  - especially around dynamic areas of the face such as around the eyes and mouth. Definisse™ Hydrobooster replenishes the levels of hyaluronic acid in the dermis, preventing and reducing these unwanted changes, resulting in radiant and glowing skin.

 

Regain your glow with new levels of HA.

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ Hydrobooster is a smooth hyaluronic acid gel which is directly injected into the superficial layer of the dermis to replenish lost levels of HA - supporting hydration and promoting water binding with the HA molecules, for ongoing moisture retention.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What is Definisse™ hydrobooster good for?

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ hydrobooster can improve skin quality and hydration. The most common treatment areas are: forehead, eye contour, cheeks, jawline, neck and around the lips.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is a Definisse™ hydrobooster treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text: The gel is injected slowly into the superficial layer of the skin using a very fine needle. This is repeated until the desired area is uniformly treated. The treatment is quick & easy and is ideally repeated 3 times at 3 week intervals. This can be repeated up to twice a year for a continued moisture boost from the skin.

Definisse™ hydrobooster contains high molecular weight HA gel, formed with long molecular chains. This type of HA is well tolerated and supports the attraction and retention of water molecules in the skin. As the skin’s natural HA is no longer diminished this hydration function continues ongoing until the newly injected HA is also naturally depleted. At this time repeat treatments are recommended to retain that new moisture level and glow.

text.text:
Definisse™ hydrobooster contains both sodium hyaluronate and glycerol. In combination these ingredients are proven to increase hydration, protect the skin against irritation, accelerate wound healing and improve the skin’s ability to retain moisture levels.


Definisse™ hydrobooster can significantly enhance the appearance and composition of your skin and give you the radiance you dreamt of.

title_1111695653.jcr:title: Defy the ageing process at a molecular level

text.text:
An injectable HA solution to replenish the loss of hyaluronic acid due to ageing, to maintain hydration, improve skin tone,

increase elasticity and to act as a filler for fine lines in the skin.

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: How do you keep skin hydrated?

text_copy_copy.text: To retain water, therefore moisture, in the skin we need to maintain our levels of hyaluronic acid. This is found naturally in the skin but dwindles as we age. Products such as Definisse™ hydrobooster can boost levels of HA which in turn attracts water molecules and maintains youthful levels of hydration.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What is the best type of moisturiser?

text_copy_copy.text: Hyaluronic acid is the skin’s primary vehicle of hydration. It attracts and retains water molecules, nourishing and plumping the skin. Therefore a product that contains active levels of HA is the best support you can give your skin to maintain its hydration.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: How can I boost my facial hydration?

text_copy_copy.text: Topical moisturisers are useful to prevent dehydration but they cannot create or promote additional hydration. Definisse™ hydrobooster contains high molecular weight HA gel, formed with long molecular chains and is injected directly into the dermis - instantly and progressively regaining and maintaining the skin’s ability to hydrate itself.

title_1657927442_cop.jcr:title: Definisse™3D lift threads can be combined with other Definisse™ products, to achieve the best possible results in holistic rejuvenation, for optimal well being.

title.jcr:title: Experience the ultimate boost to your skin quality, texture and appearance.

text.text:
Experience the ultimate boost to your skin quality, texture and appearance. 

Two complementary HA products work in tandem to reinvigorate your skin’s natural ability to regenerate and preserve its own youthfulness.

Definisse™ Revitalise Threads inserted beneath the skin stimulate collagen production to boost the skin from the inside, creating a firmer more youthful structure. Definisse™ Hydrobooster then supports topically using hyaluronic acid to promote deep hydration, fullness and brightening from the outside.
